title: PROPHASIS
content:
PROPHASIS was the personified spirit (daimona) of excuse. She was a daughter of the foolish Titan
        Epimetheus (Afterthought).

Pindar, Pythian Ode 5. 28 (trans. Conway) (Greek lyric C5th B.C.) :
        "Prophasis (Excuse) daughter of the late-contriving Epimatheos (Epimetheus, Afterthought)."

A complete bibliography of the translations quoted on this page.
